name: The Hillman Companies
overview: The Hillman Companies, Inc. provides hardware-related products and related merchandising services to retail markets. The companyâ€™s products include small parts, such as fasteners and related hardware items; threaded rod and metal shapes; keys, key duplication systems, and accessories; and identification items, such as tags and letters, numbers, and signs. Its fastener line of products include standard and specialty nuts, bolts, washers, screws, anchors, and picture hanging items, as well as indoor and outdoor project fasteners. The companyâ€™s threaded rod and metal shapes product line includes hot and cold rolled rod, weld-able and plated, and a line of all-thread rod in galvanized, stainless steel, and brass. It also offers key accessories, including key chains, tags, lights, floats, holders, whistles, and other complementary items. In addition, the company offers Quick-Tag, a consumer-operated vending system that provides custom engraved specialty items, such as pet identification tags, luggage tags, and other engraved identification tags; and engraves and dispenses specialty products, such as pet identification tags, military-style I.D. tags, holiday ornaments, and luggage tags. Further, its identification items comprise individual and/or packaged letters, numbers, signs, safety related products, driveway markers, and various sign accessories, such as sign frames for homeowners and commercial users; and household items include coat hooks, door stops, hinges, gate latches, hasps, and decorative hardware. The company serves hardware stores, home centers, mass merchants, pet supply stores, and other retail outlets in the United States, Canada, Mexico, Latin America, and the Caribbean. It has a strategic partnership agreement with Barnes Distribution for the distribution of the proprietary PC+ Code Cutter, which produces automobile keys based on a vehicleâ€™s identification number. The company was founded in 1964 and is headquartered in Cincinnati, Ohio.
